flashcards.question: Title
flashcards.answer: Egypt's Sobhi handed four-year doping ban, anti-doping body says
flashcards.context: This news article discusses a sports-related issue involving an Egyptian football player.
flashcards.summary: Ramadan Sobhi, an Egyptian football player who won the CAF Champions League with Pyramids and played in the English Premier League, has been banned for four years by the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) due to an anti-doping rule violation.
